trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Springfield

Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsWas going home from springfield mo saw a bright star like light in the sky northwest kept watching the light and it was not moving no other stars out we thought it was an odd looking star the closer to home we got wich was qnother 8miles from willard mo it looked bigger the closer to it we got we turned on our road and i was trying to hurry to see what it was we was about a half a block from my drive way and seen it over the tree tops across the road from my house we live in the country we stopped the.car to look at the ball of light it was being very still till my boyfriend got out of the car on the side of the road it then took off south west with a low hum or buzz as it rose in the air higher we saw 3 points of white light with one red light as it was going southwest it then turned as glide side ways took off to the northeast watched it till it was gone 2other people that we know of in the area berd the hum. We have saw several of the moving white lights we call travlers but never like this
Summary: bright light in sky seen from springfield when we got home seen over tree top
